Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR IMAGE OVERLAY
Test.Name: GetOSDOptions contains FormatsSupported, uri with ? simbol
Test.Description: Use service/1 credentials Script to check that DTT correctly uses uri with ? simbol Test will be failed, because uri of 229 camera Check that DTT sends POST to provided uri

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR IMAGE OVERLAY WITH 2 VideoSourceConfiguration
Test.Name: #1581: One VSC does not support OSD (MaximumNumberOfOSDs.Total =0)
Test.Description: Ticket #1581: if DUT sends MaximumNumberOfOSDs.Total =0 in OSD options, the Client shall assue that this VSC does not support OSD

Test.TestName: CREATE OSD CONFIGURATION FOR IMAGE OVERLAY WITH 2 VideoSourceConfiguration
Test.Name: #1581: All VSCs do not support OSD (MaximumNumberOfOSDs.Total =0)
Test.Description: Ticket #1581: if DUT sends MaximumNumberOfOSDs.Total =0 in OSD options, the Client shall assue that this VSC does not support OSD
